column4: hello, I have installed libdvdcss2 from medibuntu on my MacBook 4.1 but cannot play DVDs.  I have tried 2 different DVDs, both fail with "An error occurred  Cannot read from resource" in totem.  I rebooted into OS X and had to select a region (first time playing dvd), but afterwards the DVD worked in OS X.  When I returned to ubuntu, I still had the same error.  Here is dmesg output: http://pastebin.com/f75755a26.  How do I get my MacBook to

hello, I have installed libdvdcss2 from medibuntu on my MacBook 4.1 but cannot play DVDs.  I have tried 2 different DVDs, both fail with "An error occurred  Could not read from resource" in totem.  I rebooted into OS X and had to select a region (first time playing dvd), but afterwards the DVD worked in OS X.  When I returned to ubuntu, I still had the same error.  Here is dmesg output: http://pastebin.com/f75755a26.  How do I get my MacBook
rootrot did you follow the guide here? https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RestrictedFormats/PlayingDVDs
yeah except that I installed libdvdcss2 from medibuntu instead of running the .sh script
